title: Flora Hamilton
text:

Flora Hamilton is a current masters student at UCSB’s Bren School of Environmental Science and Management, pursuing a degree in Environmental Data Science. When not thinking about data science she’s probably reading, playing board games, or outdoors.




Bowdoin College | Brunswick, ME BA in Mathematics and Environmental Studies, Economics Minor | Aug 2014 - May 2021




Data Intern | Cary Institute of Ecosystems Studies | Dec 2022 - Jun 2023
Investment Specialist | SOSV | Jul 2021 - April 2022
